original_text: Now the people of Bethel had sent Sharezer and Regem-melech and their men to entreat the favor of the Lord,
korean_text: 그 때에 벧엘 사람이 사레셀과 레겜멜렉과 그의 부하들을 보내어 여호와께 은혜를 구하고

sentences.original_text: Now the people of Bethel had sent
Sharezer and Regem-melech and their men
to entreat the favor of the Lord
